entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RadioButton visual does not update properly when enabled/disabled on Android #14195
  • Xamarin.Forms UWP CollectionView Memory leak #14194
  • [Windows] Narrator, NVDA, JAWS screen reader shortcuts have limited functionality #14193
  • [MacCatalyst] Tab and Shift+Tab keyboard navigation is inconsistent #14192
  • [MacCatalyst] Tab does not keyboard navigate away from Editor control #14191
  • [MacCatalyst] SearchBar clear text button not keyboard accessible #14190
  • MSB4044: The "CompileAppManifest" task was not given a value for the required parameter "DefaultSdkVersion" #14189
  • HorizontalOptions/VerticalOptions property to Frame not working , Android .NET 7.0 #14188
  • [Android] Inconsistent first TalkBack focus on navigating to new page #14187
  • [Android] Issues with swiping at the bottom of a ScrollView w/ TalkBack #14186
  • BlazorWebView/WebView2 Transparent background not transparent on Windows #14185
  • Android local pdf file path as source of webview is not displaying #14184
  • MacCatalyst - Menu items are lost when creating new windows and returning to previous windows. #14178
  • HorizontalStackLayout to use full width #14177

Closed

  • Flyout Issue: "ArgumentOutOfRangeException" upon "await Shell.Current.GoToAsync()" #13932
    Backlog
  • Cannot publish .aab MAUI solution #7734
  • Build crashes on iPadOS immediately when using Location #7801
    Backlog
  • Frame behaves differently compared to Xamarin.Forms #10807
    Backlog
  • Secure Storage GetAsync on Android Fails To Return Value #12341
    Backlog
  • MAUI Blazor. Publish iOS. Can not create an IOS archive. Code object is not signed at all. In subcomponent. SQLLitePCLRaw.lib.e_sqllite.ios.aotdata.arm64 #14044

PullRequests

Created

  • Updated Templates for Blazor apps for MacCatalyst #14196
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • Bump NUnit3TestAdapter from 4.3.1 to 4.4.2 #14183
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [WIP] Add first draft color test #14180
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨

Merged

  • [Essentials] Remove lock from SecureStorage #13940
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Make sure that we have valid values for setting the ContentSize of the ScrollView on iOS #14176
  • [net6.0] Updating Microsoft.Windows.SDK.BuildTools to 10.0.22621.756 #14106
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Updating Microsoft.Windows.SDK.BuildTools to 10.0.22621.756 #14150
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Merge main into net8.0 #14170
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Essentials: Port Xamarin.MediaGallery #13564
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [ios] fix memory leak with `Page` + `Layout` #14108
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [net7.0] Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #14020
    area/drawing ✏️
  • SourceGen now supports internal duplicate types #14171
    area/Xaml </>
  • Expose BlazorWebView.TryDispatchAsync() API for access to scoped services #13425
    area/blazor 🕸️, do-not-merge
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
